betterquesting:10.desc:8:
ยง6ยง7Some of the molten metals in the smeltery combine into alloys. JEI has a page listing what metal combinations will form alloys.

The first alloys used in the pack are bronze and aluminum brass.

Bronze is made by combining one part molten tin, and three parts molten copper!

Aluminum brass is made by combining one part molten copper and three parts molten aluminum!
